doc.field: STATE GAS [BGC] PREFERRED UPGRADED BY S/P

- Standard and Poor's Corp said it raised to A from A-minus Bay State Gas Co's preferred stock. S and P affirmed the company's A-rated senior debt and A-1 commercial paper. Bay State has 75 mln dlrs of long-term debt and preferred outstanding. The rating agency said its action mainly reflected debt redemptions. S and P also said the outlook for firm sales growth is positive because of a vibrant regional economy.
